content:
So I just merged and am deploying here a series of refactors to the message content CSS to make it a lot more sane and readable, and also to improve the way we handle formatting of paragraphs adjacent to non-paragraph things like blockquotes. I suspect there will be some smaller tweaks we'll do on top of this over the coming days to adjust 1-3px in a few places to make things look nicer, but I just wanted to flag this change as a potential source for bugs that everyone should be on the look for starting in about 5 minutes when the deploy finishes. :slight_smile:

I'd like to thank @Vinit Singh for helping pushing this forward -- his work helped me figure out what we should do to make this more rational. The branch is the commits ending with d14a1fd1b12dc7dcbb6397ef76702267612efedc.
